job_details.Functieomschrijving:
In overleg
   Medior, Senior
   Den Haag
   Through your machine learning solutions, you create simplified processes for our customers and help us establish ourselves as 'digital first'. With a solution-oriented and active mindset, you come up with technical solutions, using AI models.
   Direct solliciteren Neem contact op

   Through your solutions, the data team and the AI team create more business value. In addition to creating business value, knowledge transfer and coaching are also an important part of your job. The goal is to take the engineering skills of your fellow data scientists to the next level, among other things by following best practices.

What you are going to do

   You are able to take the lead in devising and designing AI-driven applications. We are currently mainly building state-of-the-art applications with (OpenAI's GPT) LLMs. An important point of attention here is that everything is secure, scalable and repeatable. You will work closely with the Data Scientists to improve the Machine Learning Lifecycle. The focus is on code quality, CI/CD, testing and monitoring. Security is an important part of your application and you are aware of the compliance rules within NN. If you would love to experience an overlap of AI, Software and Data Engineering in your work, then this is your place.
     * You will develop a scalable solution that will generate email responses to incoming emails using LLM agentic frameworks (Langchain, Langgraph)
     * You bring AI models (data products) to production, for example in the form of APIs
     * You develop and maintain the machine learning infrastructure, fitting into the NN landscape
     * You develop AI applications based on CI/CD, high-quality code, testing and monitoring, Who you will work with

   You will be working in our Competence Center, where we work on applications for the business through projects. Your team includes several data scientists and a machine learning engineer. You will work closely with your fellow machine learning engineer. We also work with various end-to-end teams, all of which exchange specialist knowledge. In this way, we work very efficiently on scalable solutions. In this process, we learn a lot from each other. Our ambition is to become even better at AI.

   Together we work on state-of-the-art solutions, in Python and in the (Azure) cloud. In your work, you experience a lot of freedom and responsibility. That ensures that you continue to grow. In the team we work hybrid, where we meet together at the office at least once a week.
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer - LLM Agents

In overleg
   Medior, Senior
   Den Haag
   Through your machine learning solutions, you create simplified processes for our customers and help us establish ourselves as 'digital first'. With a solution-oriented and active mindset, you come up with technical solutions, using AI models.
   Direct solliciteren Neem contact op

   Through your solutions, the data team and the AI team create more business value. In addition to creating business value, knowledge transfer and coaching are also an important part of your job. The goal is to take the engineering skills of your fellow data scientists to the next level, among other things by following best practices.

What you are going to do

   You are able to take the lead in devising and designing AI-driven applications. We are currently mainly building state-of-the-art applications with (OpenAI's GPT) LLMs. An important point of attention here is that everything is secure, scalable and repeatable. You will work closely with the Data Scientists to improve the Machine Learning Lifecycle. The focus is on code quality, CI/CD, testing and monitoring. Security is an important part of your application and you are aware of the compliance rules within NN. If you would love to experience an overlap of AI, Software and Data Engineering in your work, then this is your place.
     * You will develop a scalable solution that will generate email responses to incoming emails using LLM agentic frameworks (Langchain, Langgraph)
     * You bring AI models (data products) to production, for example in the form of APIs
     * You develop and maintain the machine learning infrastructure, fitting into the NN landscape
     * You develop AI applications based on CI/CD, high-quality code, testing and monitoring, Who you will work with

   You will be working in our Competence Center, where we work on applications for the business through projects. Your team includes several data scientists and a machine learning engineer. You will work closely with your fellow machine learning engineer. We also work with various end-to-end teams, all of which exchange specialist knowledge. In this way, we work very efficiently on scalable solutions. In this process, we learn a lot from each other. Our ambition is to become even better at AI.

   Together we work on state-of-the-art solutions, in Python and in the (Azure) cloud. In your work, you experience a lot of freedom and responsibility. That ensures that you continue to grow. In the team we work hybrid, where we meet together at the office at least once a week.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and deployment of applications using LLMs, specifically mentioning LLM agentic frameworks like Langchain and Langgraph, and the use of OpenAI's GPT. It also highlights building production-grade, secure, and scalable user-facing systems, which are core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. While ML Engineer skills are mentioned, the primary focus is on generative AI applications.

job_tasks.justification: The job involves developing AI-driven applications using LLMs and bringing AI models to production, which directly relates to the core process of creating and deploying models.
Specifically mentions using LLMs and agentic frameworks for generating email responses, which is a core generative modeling task.
job_tasks.phrase: generate email responses to incoming emails using LLM agentic frameworks

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'bring AI models (data products) to production' indicates the deployment and operationalization of trained models.
job_tasks.phrase: bring AI models (data products) to production

job_tasks.justification: The role involves building applications around AI models, including creating APIs, which is a key aspect of software development for AI integration.
Developing AI applications based on CI/CD, high-quality code, testing, and monitoring points to traditional software engineering practices applied to AI.
job_tasks.phrase: develop AI applications based on CI/CD, high-quality code, testing and monitoring

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions building state-of-the-art applications with LLMs, emphasizing security, scalability, and repeatability, which are software development concerns.
job_tasks.phrase: building state-of-the-art applications with (OpenAI's GPT) LLMs

job_tasks.justification: The overlap of AI, Software, and Data Engineering suggests a role that bridges these disciplines, with a strong software development component.
job_tasks.phrase: overlap of AI, Software and Data Engineering

job_tasks.justification: Developing and maintaining machine learning infrastructure that fits into the existing landscape is a core MLOps responsibility.
job_tasks.phrase: develop and maintain the machine learning infrastructure

job_tasks.justification: Improving the Machine Learning Lifecycle, focusing on code quality, CI/CD, testing, and monitoring are all key MLOps practices.
job_tasks.phrase: improve the Machine Learning Lifecycle. The focus is on code quality, CI/CD, testing and monitoring.

job_tasks.justification: The role aims to create simplified processes for customers and establish a 'digital first' approach, indicating a need to understand business goals and translate them into technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: create simplified processes for our customers and help us establish ourselves as 'digital first'.

job_tasks.justification: Creating business value through solutions and knowledge transfer/coaching aligns with understanding business needs and contributing to team growth.
job_tasks.phrase: create more business value. In addition to creating business value, knowledge transfer and coaching are also an important part of your job.

soft_skills.phrase: work closely with the Data Scientists
work closely with your fellow machine learning engineer
learn a lot from each other
experience a lot of freedom and responsibility
take the lead in devising and designing AI-driven applications
